document.full_text: capital one financial  is among firms that have expressed interest in buying ing direct usa, the online banking arm of dutch financial services firm ing groep nv , bloomberg said, citing two people with knowledge of the matter.
document.title: capital one interested in buying ing's u.s. online bank: report
